acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should fill POJOs with public, non default constructors
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldFillPojosWithPublicNonDefaultPublicConstructors

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.pdm33.NoDefaultPublicConstructorPojo
Then the Object should not be null
Then the String field 49GmhxFc1q cannot be null or empty
Then the int field should not be zero
